trans-unit.source: Contains information about a part of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> at a specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre uma parte do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> em uma coordenada especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> class, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is used to determine which part of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> classe, junto com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> método do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> é usado para determinar qual parte de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> o usuário clicou.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> class contains the location and associated designer that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> classe contém o local e o designer associado que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: The location on the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O local no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associado que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associado à classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property stores a reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.AssociatedDesigner%2A> propriedade armazena uma referência para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associados a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to reference extended information about the designer associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> para fazer referência a informações estendidas sobre o designer associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the area hit.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites de ocorrência da área.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that encloses the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object or an empty rectangle if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object is not associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo que contém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> objeto ou um retângulo vazio se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> objeto não está associado um designer.

trans-unit.source: The bounds will describe the area on the screen that was hit, usually the area that encloses the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Os limites descreverá a área na tela que foi atingida, normalmente a área que envolve associado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about where the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações sobre em que ponto houve a ocorrência.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> that describes the area hit.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> que descreve a ocorrência de área.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.HitLocation%2A> to determine on what area of the designer the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.HitLocation%2A> para determinar em qual área do designer a ocorrência ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the hit designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice do designer de ocorrência.

trans-unit.source: The index of the designer hit by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice do designer atingido pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the value returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.MapToIndex%2A> to determine which designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Usar o valor retornado por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.MapToIndex%2A> para determinar quais designer foi atingido.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for insertion or deletion operations.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil para operações de inserção ou exclusão.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: Use `Nowhere` to get an empty <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Use `Nowhere` obter vazio <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto selecionável associado à área de clique.

trans-unit.source: A selectable object associated with the hit area or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no designer is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto selecionável associado com a área de ocorrência ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic) se nenhum designer está associado com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Use `SelectableObject` to get the selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Use `SelectableObject` para obter o objeto selecionável associado com a área de ocorrência.

trans-unit.source: If a designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> will return the activity associated with the designer, or null reference (`Nothing`) if no designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Se um designer está associado com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> retornará a atividade associada com a designer ou referência nula (`Nothing`) se nenhum designer está associado com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados do usuário associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A new dictionary for user data, or a reference to the existing user data.
trans-unit.target: Um novo dicionário para dados de usuário ou uma referência a dados existentes do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> to store user information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> para armazenar informações do usuário sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: If no user data has been stored, calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> creates a new, empty dictionary for use.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dado de usuário foi armazenado, chamando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> cria um dicionário de novo e vazio para uso.
